background: Former Mossad officer, now freelance intelligence contractor. Highly skilled in signals intelligence and surveillance. Left Mossad officially but maintains old contacts.
hidden_agenda: Occasionally tips old Mossad contacts when he believes it serves both Israeli and agency interests. Rationalizes this as 'aligned objectives' but it's unauthorized intelligence sharing.

relationships.NIGHTHAWK: professional respect — but questions his reliability in Iran ops
relationships.GHOST: openly distrusts — considers him a liability
relationships.LOTUS: suspicious — too many coincidences in her reporting

voice_style: Male, Israeli accent, clipped and confident
